devops.summary: As a DevOps Consultant - AWS, I collaborated with client teams to optimize cloud infrastructure and enhance information security. My key accomplishments include:
highlights: Configured and deployed a production-ready AWS ECS cluster to support a Node.js application, ensuring optimal performance and scalability
Implemented SELinux policies and centralized audit logging to establish proper level of security hardening of OS base images
Managed an RDS Aurora PostgreSQL database optimized for high availability
Implemented comprehensive AWS infrastructure security measures
Helped preparing for a FedRAMP audit
Collaborated with development and project management teams on AWS best practices and cost optimization
